snippet: As a Yankee, Alex Rodriguez won a World Series title in 2009 and Most Valuable Player awards in 2005 and 2007, but he might be better remembered for a number of bizarre moments in pinstripes.
lead_paragraph: As a Yankee, Alex Rodriguez won a World Series title in 2009 and Most Valuable Player awards in 2005 and 2007, but he might be better remembered for a number of bizarre moments in pinstripes.
